name: Keep It Alive (Team Horsehead)
description:
You wash ashore on a small island, with a baby dragon next to you, your task is to look after this dragon and raise it as if it's your own child, name it, feed it and play songs to it to keep it content, if the dragon stays alive, you might be able to see it grow!

Controls:

Space - Throw/Action

Mousewheel/1234 Keys - Inventory Items

C - crafting menu

shift - sprint

M - Mute audio
